result.reason: Crash in mstscax.dll (Microsoft RDP ActiveX) on outdated Windows 10 1909 and mRemoteNG 1.76 — external component bug, not mRemoteNG code; no user response since 2020 despite triage refresh request.
result.approach: Close as not-reproducible/stale — crash is in Microsoft's RDP DLL, not our code. User was asked to retest on latest build with no response for 6 years.

attempts.raw_output:
The issue is a crash in `mstscax.dll` (Microsoft RDP ActiveX control) — not in mRemoteNG code. It's from 2020, on an old version (1.76), with an old Windows build. A maintainer already suggested updating the OS/DLL. No response from the reporter since 2020, and we already posted a triage refresh comment in February 2026.
